          <title>
            <string language="en">Physical Propertis of Halogens</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propertis physique des halogènes</string>

          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a film which demonstraties the physical properties of the Halogens</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical analysis</string>
